comments: This includes the space around the edges that is used to fasten the stock to the spoilboard
This stock is plywood that is nominally 1/2" thick, but it's actually a little undersized.
These stock dimensions include space for 1/4" holddowns on the top and bottom, with a stop on the right side for x-axis alignment.

job.comments: We can safely cut deeper than this, but the plywood tears out if the first cut is too deep.,

comments: This slot is just slightly more than 3/16" deep, which means I can put in a 3/8" T-slot extrusion
and use the same depth of rail slot in the jig faceplate.
cuts.name: slot left
